languages.text: "Пропажи двух зарвавшихся работяг тоже никто не заметит, если попадемся. Лучше жить впроголодь, чем самому стать подножным кормом".
"If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."
languages.original_text: "Пропажи двух зарвавшихся работяг тоже никто не заметит, если попадемся. Лучше жить впроголодь, чем самому стать подножным кормом".

traits.locale_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."
"If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."
"If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

"If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

languages.text: 「もし見つかったって、下働きが何人か消えたところで、誰も気にしない。パンくずで生き延びる方が、パンくずになるよりマシだろ」
languages.original_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

traits.locale_text: 「もし見つかったって、下働きが何人か消えたところで、誰も気にしない。パンくずで生き延びる方が、パンくずになるよりマシだろ」

languages.text: "Yakalanırsak üç beş angaryacı, kimsenin umurunda olmaz. Kırıntılarla yaşamak, kırıntı olmaktan iyidir."
languages.original_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

traits.locale_text: "Yakalanırsak üç beş angaryacı kimsenin umurunda olmaz. Kırıntılarla yaşamak, kırıntı olmaktan iyidir."

languages.text: «Y si nos pillan, nadie echará de menos a un par de desgraciados. Mejor sobrevivir a base de migajas que ser las migajas».
languages.original_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

traits.locale_text: «Y si nos pillan, nadie echará de menos a un par de desgraciados. Mejor sobrevivir a base de migajas que ser las migajas».

languages.text: “可万一被人抓住了，就算失踪了两个干杂活的，也一样没人会管。拿点渣渣对付着填饱肚子算了，我可不想变成渣渣。”
languages.original_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

traits.locale_text: “可万一被人抓住了，就算失踪了两个干杂活的，也一样没人会管。拿点渣渣对付着填饱肚子算了，我可不想变成渣渣。”

languages.text: « Si on se fait attraper, personne ne remarquera non plus la disparition de deux pauvres tâcherons comme nous. Je préfère encore me nourrir de rogatons plutôt que de finir en miettes. »
languages.original_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

traits.locale_text: « Si on se fait attraper, personne ne remarquera non plus la disparition de deux pauvres tâcherons comme nous. Je préfère encore me nourrir de rogatons plutôt que de finir en miettes. »

languages.text: "Und wenn wir erwischt werden, wird uns niemand vermissen. Ich lebe lieber mit wenig, als gar nicht."
languages.original_text: "If we get caught, no one's going to miss a couple of drudges either. Better to survive on crumbs than become the crumbs."

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn wir erwischt werden, wird uns niemand vermissen. Ich lebe lieber mit wenig, als gar nicht."
